data.title: Bitcoin suffers its first October monthly loss in seven years
data.description:
Bitcoin ended October lower for the first time since 2018, breaking a seven-year run of gains in a month traders once treated like free profit season, according to data from CoinGecko. The OG crypto closed the month down about 5% as risk appetite weakened, leverage was wiped out, and uncertainty hit global markets. The decline […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/bitcoin-first-october-monthly-loss-7-years/

data.title: Latin American Crypto Exchange Ripio Launches Argentine Peso Stablecoin 'wARS'
data.description:
Latin American cryptocurrency exchange Ripio has officially launched a new stablecoin named 'wARS,' which is pegged to the Argentine peso. This innovative digital currency aims to provide a stable and reliable means of transaction within the cryptocurrency market, especially in Argentina, where economic fluctuations can impact the value of traditional currencies. With the introduction of wARS, Ripio is positioning itself as a key player in the expanding ecosystem of stablecoins in the region, offering users a more secure and stable alternative for conducting their financial activities.
source: https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2025/11/01/latin-american-crypto-exchange-ripio-launches-argentine-peso-stablecoin-wars

data.title: Berkshire Hathaway earnings surge by 34% in Q3 as Warren Buffett hoards $381B, skips buybacks
data.description:
Berkshire Hathaway posted a sharp 34% jump in third-quarter operating earnings, hitting $13. 485 billion, while its cash stash ballooned to an all-time high of $381. 6 billion. According to its earnings report, this massive profit surge came from a more than 200% surge in insurance underwriting income, which totaled $2. 37 billion. But while the cash keeps […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/berkshire-hathaway-earnings-surge-by-34/
